測定不能: (そくていふのう) - unmeasurable; impossible to measure
測定方法: (そくていほうほう) - measurement method
測定法: (そくていほう) - method of measurement
測定限界: (そくていげんかい) - measurement limit; measurement limitation; measuring limit
測量学: (そくりょうがく) - surveying; land surveying
測量技師: (そくりょうぎし) - surveyor; surveying engineer
測量機械: (そくりょうきかい) - surveying instrument; surveyor's level
測長機: (そくちょうき) - length measuring machine
港内: (こうない) - inside the harbour; inside the harbor
港則法: (こうそくほう) - Act on Port Regulations
港区: (みなとく) - Harbour Ward (e.g. in Tokyo)
港口: (こうこう) - harbor entrance; harbour entrance
港外: (こうがい) - outside a port or harbor (harbour)
港湾労働者: (こうわんろうどうしゃ) - longshoreman; stevedore
港湾局: (こうわんきょく) - Port and Harbor Authority
港湾当局: (こうわんとうきょく) - port authorities
港湾税: (こうわんぜい) - harbor duties; harbour duties
港湾運送事業: (こうわんうんそうじぎょう) - port transport industry
港湾運送業: (こうわんうんそうぎょう) - port transport industry
游撃: (ゆうげき) - raid/military attack by a mobile unit/hit-and-run attack/search-and-kill mission/search-and-destroy mission/military action without a predetermined target/attacking the enemy or assisting allies as the opportunity arises; shortstop
游泳: (ゆうえい) - swimming/bathing; conduct of life
游魚: (ゆうぎょ) - fish swimming about in water
渺々: (びょうびょう) - boundless; limitless; vast; broad
渺渺: (びょうびょう) - boundless; limitless; vast; broad
渾沌: (こんとん) - (ant: 秩序) confusion/chaos/disorder; chaotic/confused/uncertain/disarrayed
渾淆: (こんこう) - mixture/intermixture/mixing up/jumbling together; contamination/creation of unorthodox words or phrases by combining terms of similar form or meaning
渾然: (こんぜん) - whole; entire; harmonious; well-rounded
渾然一体: (こんぜんいったい) - (yoji) in complete harmony
渾然一体となる: (こんぜんいったいとなる) - to form a complete whole; to be joined together
渾身: (こんしん) - with all one's might; with one's whole body
湖心: (こしん) - center of a lake; centre of a lake
湖沼型: (こしょうがた) - lake type (i.e. eutrophic, dystrophic, oligotrophic)
湖沼水質保全特別措置法: (こしょうすいしつほぜんとくべつそちほう) - Law Concerning Special Measures for Conservation of Lake Water Quality
湖沼生態系: (こしょうせいたいけい) - lake ecosystem
湛える: (たたえる) - to fill (to the brim); to express (an emotion)/to look (sad, glad)/to wear (a smile)
湛水: (たたえみず) - flooding; filling; inundation; submerging; clogging
湧き: (waki) - welling (up), gushing forth (of water), springing out, surging; appearing (especialmente de repente) , welling (up), gushing forth (of water), springing out, surging; appearing (esp. suddenly); frothing of water (due to an advancing school of fish)
湧き上がる: (わきあがる) - (esp. 沸き上がる) to boil up/to come to the boil/to seethe; to arise/to break out; to get excited/to be in uproar
湧き上る: (わきあがる) - (esp. 沸き上がる) to boil up/to come to the boil/to seethe; to arise/to break out; to get excited/to be in uproar
湧き起こる: (わきおこる) - to well up; to burst; to arise
湧き起る: (わきおこる) - to well up; to burst; to arise
湧く: (waku) - to well (up), to gush forth (of water), to spring out, to surge; to appear (especialmente de repente) (sweat, tears, etc.) , to well (up), to gush forth (of water), to spring out, to surge; to appear (esp. suddenly) (sweat, tears, etc.); to feel emotions form (joy, bravery, etc.); to hatch (esp. of parasitic insects, etc.)
湧出: (ようしゅつ) - gushing out; welling up; springing up
